vocabulary.definition: a group of living organisms consisting of similar individuals capable of exchanging genes or interbreeding
vocabulary.example: The conservation efforts are aimed at protecting endangered species of animals.

vocabulary.definition: a great disaster resulting in widespread destruction and the end of the world as we know it
vocabulary.example: The movie depicted a post-apocalyptic world where humanity struggles to survive.

vocabulary.definition: the quality of being clever, original, and inventive
vocabulary.example: His ingenuity in solving complex problems impressed his colleagues.

vocabulary.definition: involving or causing sudden great damage or suffering
vocabulary.example: The earthquake had catastrophic consequences for the city, leaving many homeless.

vocabulary.definition: deprived of power or rights; marginalized
vocabulary.example: The organization works to empower disenfranchised communities through education and advocacy.

vocabulary.definition: able to be maintained at a certain rate or level without exhausting natural resources or causing severe ecological damage
vocabulary.example: The company implemented sustainable practices to reduce its environmental impact.
